ygData.subject: Re: Watchman Drexlin quest...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes Lore...didnt i say that? :) My bad. I was typing in a hurry.  They are no longer lore, however...after hunting them tonight, it still apears to be broken.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes Lore...didnt i say that? :) My bad. I was typing in a hurry. They are no
longer lore, however...after hunting them tonight, it still apears to be
broken. We gatered 3 boxes full of the "very tiny crumpled skeleton", (Which
when identify is cast on them are found to be "undead brownie") but were not
able to get them to combine in the box. They spawn in North K near the gypsy
camp and wander around. You may need to start the quest with Drexlin to make
them pop. Found him upstairs in the bridge tower. Also tryied giving him the
skeletons in the box uncombined. Didn't work. I say keep trying it and see if
it gets fixed.


At 12:37 AM 1/3/00 -0800, you wrote:
>
> From: Gazamel Prime Can you tell us where and when he spawns? I can roam the
> karanas for days without a tracker, so this information would be really
> helpful Thanks =) --- The Cleaner wrote: > I have spoken to Drexlin and
> recived the Quest. He > says he was sent to the > Karanas to Kill some
undead
> Brownies, and return > their remains to Akannon. > He gives you a 4 slot Box
> which is No Drop i belive. > Last i heard this > quest was broken because
the
> Tiny skelitens you > recive when you kill the > undead brownies are NO DROP,
> so getting 4 of them > and filling the box is > not possible. He also
says he
> is in a hurry and > gives you a deadline for > returning the full box to
him.
> I dont think anyone > is killing him when he > spawns , just that he is rare
> and only spawns a > certain times and then goes > away again. hope this
> helps. > > Rexus Maximus, Veeshan. > > > At 10:20 AM 12/29/99 +1300, you
> wrote: > >From: jbuckingham@... > > > >Watchman Drexlin - this is a
> new quest, where one > of the guys the > >Gemchoppers hall who previously
> never said anything > now directs you to find > >Watchman Drexlin near
> Qeynos. According to > Allakhazam's site, he spawns > >near/on the stone
> bridge between north and south > karana, on the north > >Karana side and
> gives you a quest to kill Tiny > Skeletons. I've never been > >able to find
> him, probably due ot the sheer number > of powergaming weenies > >that are
> KoS to gemchoppers from killing gnome > guards, so he probably > >doesnt
last
> too long once he pops. Has anyone > managed to complete this > >quest
yet? Is
> he always there unless someone kills > him, or does he only > >spawn at
> certain times of the day... I'm hoping the > later, cos it really > >bugs me
> when people kill quest creatures - I still > remember when I was > >young
and
> I could only do the report quests after a > server reboot, becasue > >the
> guard killers would often kill Joogl Doobraugh > as well, and he has a >
> >really long spawn time.. > > > >> >
